reviewText:
I was not too fond of this purchase.  While some of the train scenes were o.k., there could have been much more scenery from the train.  I had trouble understanding why some of the footage in a train dvd was included, such as a longer camera shot of work on a fishing boat, and one of bag pipe playing.  Also too many track only scenes.
Some things left out that could have been included and made it better, were; mention of the name of some of the places they showed (some they did, some they didn't name), and one time they raised my interest in a private train journey, and then didn't show any of that journey that sounded so great.
This is the low cost way of travel and my favorite part is when the travel Scottland and above all Ireland.
WOW !!! This is a beautiful and breathtaking video . Scenery was out of this world and I am extremely glad I bought it

Out of all the Great Railroad Adventures, I liked this one the best.
The DVD was low priced and sometimes I have wondered if I would get
a really good one.  This one is a really good one. The scenary in
Scotland and Ireland is breathtaking especially Scotland. The train ride
was  one I would really like to take but is very expensive all the
way. Ireland is such a beautiful country of hills and dales, it is hard
to imagine the strife going on for what seems like forever between
the Brits and the Irish.
